# cmccloudv2_volume (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get volume by name
data "cmccloudv2_volume" "volume_1" { 
    name = "ev-k8s3"
}

# get root volume of server
data "cmccloudv2_volume" "volume_root" { 
    server_id = "44fa95ef-5b29-4c81-840f-c2ae310cdbdd"
    bootable = true
}

# get volume by id
data "cmccloudv2_volume" "volume_root" { 
    volume_id = "5d0fecd3-728d-46b1-98bd-93d1cefba685"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `bootable` (Boolean) filter by volume bootable
- `description` (String) filter by volume that contains this text (case-insensitive)
- `name` (String) Filter by name of volume (case-insenitive)
- `server_id` (String) Id of the server that volume attached, match exactly
- `status` (String) Filter by status of volume (case-insenitive), match exactly
- `volume_id` (String) Id of the volume
- `zone` (String) Filter by zone of that volume (case-insenitive), match exactly

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Created time of volume
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
